JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Kok søges til ny Britisk restaurant i Odense centrum
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Mitchell's carvery is a British inspired restaurant in Odense centre. With a stor focus on comfortable homely food, made from the bottom up. Our A La Carte menu holds classic dishes from Fish N Chips and Meat & Ale Pie, to braiset beefbrisket, English Breakfast and more. We serve a Carvery buffet every Friday and Saturday evening, as well as breakfast each morning, afternoon tea and cakes.

We create our dishes with passion, and already have a fast growing reputation for the quality we are delivering. If you think you have the skills, passion for food, and eye for details then we want to hear from you. Being a newly started business, we are looking for a chef who is involved in concept development, creative, and flexible. 

Immediate start available for the right candidate
